definition: arrow/dart/straight/to vow/to swear/old variant of 屎[shi3]
length/duration/accident/right and wrong/good and bad/long and short
lit. use others' strengths to make up for one's weak points (idiom from Mencius)/to use this in place of that/what you lose on the swings, you win on the roundabouts

sentences.english: The horse's strides are shorter than at the other canters, without losing elasticity and cadence.
sentences.chinese: 馬的步幅比其他幾種跑步較短，但卻不失彈性與節奏。

sentences.english: The shortest Confidence interval of unimodal distribution is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了單峯分佈的最短置信區間的問題。

sentences.english: The body is brawny, limbs forceful, head round eyes, short neck little kiss long.
sentences.chinese: 軀體粗壯，四肢強健有力，頭圓頸短，眼小吻長。

sentences.english: Not only can walking fish live out of water but they can also travel short distances over land.
sentences.chinese: 鮎魚不僅可以離開水存活，還可以在岸上短間隔移動。

sentences.english: Most conjoined twins have a very short life-span.
sentences.chinese: 嬰兒大多數都壽命很短。

sentences.english: Pasterns are short and strong and slightly sloping when viewed from the side .
sentences.chinese: 從側面觀察，腕部短而結實，略有傾斜。

sentences.english: The enhancements allow for sending and receiving short C2CK pulses.
sentences.chinese: 這些改進允許發送和接收短的C2CK脈衝。

sentences.english: The pearls are all about the same size. It's quite a short necklace.
sentences.chinese: 是由小顆的珍珠串起來的很短的項鍊。

sentences.english: We now know that X-ray waves are 2,000 to 10,000 times shorter than light waves.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在知道X光波比光波短二千到一萬倍。

sentences.english: Muddle sugar, mint, and lime juice in a rocks glass.
sentences.chinese: 搗糊糖，薄荷和萊姆汁入短飲杯。

sentences.english: They scrambled over the broken walls and, within a very short time, captured the city.
sentences.chinese: 他們攀過破碎的城牆，用很短的時間就奪取了城市。

sentences.english: Uses small-diameter wheels, a short wheelbase, and steering mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 使用小直徑輪，短軸距，與導向機構。

sentences.english: The pathogenic biological characteristics of Sessileflower acanthopanax root rot was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對短梗五加根腐病病原菌進行了生物學特性研究。

sentences.english: I think my legs look stocky , so I rarely wear such short shorts.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我的腿很粗，所以很少穿這麼短的褲子。

sentences.english: The next new bulletin, shorter than usual, made no mention of the demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 下一個新聞節目比通常短，沒有提到旅行。

sentences.english: Let me end with a couple of other quick remarks.
sentences.chinese: 讓我用一些其它的短評論來做結尾。

definition: length/duration/accident/right and wrong/good and bad/long and short
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
to lengthen/to pull sth out longer
gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
